flashingInfo:
Hey, watch out!
This Mod contains some flashing lights!
Press ENTER to disable them now or go to Options Menu.
Press ESCAPE to ignore this message.
You've been warned!
updateInfoP1:
Sup bro, looks like you're running an 
 outdated version of Weird Engine (
engineThanks: Thank you for using the Engine!
freeplayInfo1: Press SPACE to listen to the Song.
freeplayInfo2: Press CTRL to open the Gameplay Changers Menu.
freeplayInfo3: Press RESET to Reset your Score and Accuracy.
lowQualityDesc:
If checked, disables some background details,
decreases loading times and improves performance.
globalAntialiasingDesc:
If unchecked, disables anti-aliasing, increases performance
at the cost of sharper visuals.
onUnfocuPauseDesc: The game pauses when you switch to an other window.
noteSplashesDesc: If unchecked, hitting "Sick!" notes won't show particles.
hideHUDDesc: If checked, hides most HUD elements.
timeBarDesc: What should the Time Bar display?
flashingLightsDesc: Uncheck this if you're sensitive to flashing lights!
cameraZoomDesc: If unchecked, the camera won't zoom in on a beat hit.
textZoomDesc:
If unchecked, disables the Score text zooming
everytime you hit a note.
HPbarAlphaDesc: How much transparent should the health bar and icons be.
pauseMusicDesc: What song do you prefer for the Pause Screen?
raitingInStageDesc: Does the raiting and combo are in the stage?
vibrationDesc: If checked, will make the game to vibrate when you die.
keyboardModeDesc:
Check this if you want to play with
your keyboard instead of your
on screen hitbox (will hide the hitbox).
downScrollDesc: If checked, notes go Down instead of Up, simple enough.
middleScrollDesc: If checked, your notes get centered.
ghostTappingDesc:
If checked, you won't get misses from pressing keys
while there are no notes able to be hit.
noAntimashDesc: If checked, Antimash will be disabled.
noResetDesc: If checked, pressing Reset won't do anything.
hitsoundVolumeDesc: Funny notes does "Tick!" when you hit them.
ratingOffsetDesc:
Changes how late/early you have to hit for a "Sick!"
Higher values mean you have to hit later.
hitWindowDesc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a "@[rating]" in milliseconds.
safeFramesDesc:
Changes how many frames you have for
hitting a note earlier or late.
